content:
/li>| |citizenshipId| | |N/A in the source system.| |crewId|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`TLC`| | |employmentDate|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`EMPLOYMENT_BEGIN_DT`|Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD| |leaveDate|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`EMPLOYMENT_END_DT`|Formatted as YYYY-MM-DD| |leaveReason| | |N/A in the source system.| |firstFlightDate|`SCHEDOPS.LEG`| | |`DEP_DT`|when `SCHEDOPS.LEG.LEG_TYPE` <> (“X“ or “Z“ or ”Y”) and
`SCHEDOPS.LEG.LEG_STATE` <> (“CNL“ or “INC“)
then min(`SCHEDOPS.LEG.DEP_DT`)| |forenames|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`FIRST_NAME`, `MIDDLE_NAME`|`FIRST_NAME` + “ “ + `MIDDLE_NAME`| |surname|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`name`| | |idCardNo|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`CC_NUMBER`| | |maidenName|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`BIRTH_NAME`| | |maritalStatus| | |N/A in the source system.| |marriageDate| | |N/A in the source system.| |nationality|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`NATIONALITY`| | |period| | |N/A in the source system.| |preferredName| | |N/A in the source system.| |secondaryId|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`EMPLOYEE_NO`| | |sex|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`SEX`| | |title|`XCREW.CREW_MEMBER`|`SEX`|
  • when `XCREW.CREW_MEMBER.SEX` = “M”then “Mr.”
  • when `XCREW.CREW_MEMBER.SEX` = “F” then “Ms.”
  • when `XCREW.CREW_MEMBER.SEX` is null
    then `XCREW.CREW_MEMBER.SEX`
| # :paperclip: Crew Info MLOGs Cleaning #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Retrieve records where `XCREW.MLOG$_CREW_MEMBER.TRANSACTION_DT` < Current Date Time(UTC) - 6 hours. #### - Source Query `Riverx_MLOG$_CREW_INFO_CLEANER` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigger:** Every 6 hours. **Steps:** * Execute `Riverx_MLOG$_CREW_INFO_CLEANER` query. #### - Data Handling Operation * Delete records from MLOG tables. # :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope **Duty MLOG Insert&Delete Records:** * Retrieve records where `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.SEQUENCE$$` > Sequence of the Latest Retrieved Data and `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` <> “U” and `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.BEGIN_DATE` >= “01.01.2024“.
